span.span: Early Learning > ECE Covid 19 Resource Page

img.alt: NEW! Important Social Distancing Guidelines from CDSS

a.strong: NEW! Important Social Distancing Guidelines from CDSS

td.div: CDSS has just issued new important guidelines on social and physical distancing for childcare facilities in response to the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic....Read more

img.alt: Covid 19 Guidance for Early Childhood Education (English)

a.strong: Covid 19 Guidance for Early Childhood Education (English)

td.div: The Los Angeles County Department of Public Health encourages all early care and education (ECE) providers to remain open as long as the center or child care home can operate safely. ...Read more

img.alt: COVID-19 Guidance for Early Childhood Education (Spanish)

a.strong: COVID-19 Guidance for Early Childhood Education (Spanish)

td.div: El Departamento de Salud Pública del Condado de Los Ángeles alienta a todos los proveedores de cuidado y educación de la primera infancia (ECE) para que mantengan abiertos sus centros infantiles o sus hogares de cuidado infantil mientras lo puedan hacer de manera segura. ...Read more
